main event: Observers watched a white light travel toward the western horizon for about 15 minutes.
interesting points: The white light was brighter than the brightest star observed in the sky., The observation type was classified as ground visual., The course of the object was westward., The object moved steadily and fairly slowly., The conclusion suggests it might have been an aircraft observation.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
witness description: The witness described the object as a white light moving with steady flight.
